decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL/VP/1975/JR/07 Rev C, PL/VP/1975/JR/05 Rev B; dated 03 2009; received 12/02/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The window formed in the side roof dormer hereby approved shall be obscure glazed, non-opening, and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of side and rear roof extensions
